Title: Mourning meeting (Commemorating June 4 1989)
Publisher: Hong Kong Alliance in Support of Democratic Movements of China (香港市民支援愛國民主運動聯合會), Hong Kong
Notes: Call for the annual candlelight vigil in Victoria Park, Hong Kong, to commemorate the June 4 massacre in Beijing.The image shows the protesters on Tian'anmen square, Beijing.
